fields.description: The specific sub-set of fuzzy file level data representations requested
The name of the license group associated with the file
The sha1 encoding of the file contents
The relative path to the file
The representation of the text offset
The byte where the copryright data begins
The byte where the copryright data ends
The relative path to the archive file
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>

links.description: The link to the next page of the results set, present only if there is another page of results
